title: Carmageddon: Reincarnation - FitGirl
description:
Carmageddon: Reincarnation (v1.0.0.7470, MULTI6) [FitGirl Repack]


::Information::


Release Date: May 21, 2015; v1.0.0.7470 - August 26, 2015
Genres/Tags: Arcade, Racing, Vehicular combat, 3D, Cars
Developer: Stainless Games
Publisher: Stainless Games
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Beelzebub
Steam User Rating: 70% of user reviews are positive (based on 2,279 reviews)

Interface Language: English, Russian, German, Spanish, Italian, French
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (3DM + REVOLT/CODEX/SSE)


::Repack Features::


Based on non-scene Carmageddon.Reincarnation.v1.1.7470.Cracked-3DM release
Additonal cracks added to NoDVD folder: CODEX, SSE & REVOLT. The latter enables limited multiplayer with your Steam friends.
MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 12.8 to 5.7 GB)
Installation takes: ~30 minutes on 8-cores CPU, ~40 minutes on 4-cores CPU, ~55 minutes on 2-cores CPU
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 12.8 GB (~22 GB during installation)
Repack by FitGirl
